Title: One Giant Leap
Plot: Claire's romantic interlude with the football quarterback takes a tragic turn. Hiro convinces his friend, Ando, that it is their destiny to travel to America to save the world. Meanwhile, Nathan uses Peter's accident for his own political gain. Officer Matt Parkman, Mohinder Suresh, and the FBI are all on the trail of the mysterious Sylar.
GuestStars: Adair Tishler, Ashlee Gillespie, Rick Scarry, Matt Eyde, Mark Nearing, Eugene Byrd, Rikki Lindhome, Tina Lifford
